directions: Mix beets, watermelon, and cilantro together in a bowl. Whisk sour cream, balsamic vinegar, olive oil, salt, and pepper together in a small bowl; pour over beet mixture. Toss to coat. Refrigerate 30 minutes before serving.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can sliced beets, drained and diced
title: Beet Summer Salad
